pages.text: Has a 2.5% chance to spawn from a $(l:revice/mobs/giff_junior)Giff Junior$(/l)

Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Revice (2021, TV show)$(br2)Health: 60$(br2)Drops$(li)2-4 $(l:revice/items/proto_vistamp)Proto Vistamps$(/l)$(li)1 $(l:revice/items/vistamps#bat_vistamp)Bat Vistamp$(/l)$(li)1 $(l:revice/items/proto_vistamp)Proto Vistamp$(/l) (66.7%)$(li)1 $(l:revice/devices/two_sidriver#two_sidriver_evil)Two Sidriver (Evil)$(/l) (16.7%)$(li)1 $(l:revice/arsenal/evil_blade)Evilblade$(/l) (16.7%)$(li)1 $(l:revice/items/vistamps#holy_wing_vistamp)Holy Wing Vistamp$(/l) (consumes a $(l:revice/items/vistamps#crow_vistamp)Crow Vistamp$(/l) from your inventory)
